chm_opt_resend_messages_desc: Resends chat messages that were posted within [X] seconds of the heist starting or ending. Can be useful since the chat is reset by default.
chm_opt_resend_thresheld_desc: Number of seconds before heist start/end in which any posted messages will be reposted.
chm_opt_resend_max_msg_desc: Limits how many messages will be reposted. May be useful for avoiding spam.
chm_opt_resend_if_not_host_desc: When you aren't the host, the mod cannot use the [SYSTEM] tag, which can make things a bit more confusing or harder to read. If you don't care about that, feel free to turn this on.
chm_opt_resend_timestamp_desc: Include the original timestamps when resending messages.
chm_opt_write_to_disk_desc: Saves all chat messages to a log file on your device, which can be read again later. Log files will always include timestamps and player IDs when possible.
chm_opt_ignore_assets_desc: Ignores all messages related to Pre-Planning and Assets.
chm_opt_ignore_system_desc: Ignores all messages with the [SYSTEM] tag.
chm_opt_include_timestamps_desc: Shows timestamps when viewing the chat log.
chm_kb_open_chatlog_desc: Access the chat log with a quick and simple press of a button.
